features: NO MORE HAIR WRAP: Tangle Guard brush roll prevents hair wrap up to 16 inches(1)
STRONG SUCTION: Specifically designed to get strong, more direct suction with every pass
FILTRATION SYSTEM: The filter captures and contains 99.95% of dust and dirt**
SWIVEL STEERING: Effortlessly maneuver around and under furniture with swivel steering
ABOVE FLOOR CLEANING: Clean hard to reach areas easily with the built-in extension wand, and specialty tools for cleaning upholstery and stairs
body.description: Say goodbye to hair wrap in your vacuum brush roll! Hoover’s Tangle Guard™ technology allows you to clean multiple surfaces without worrying about hair (up to 16 inches*) wrapping around the brush roll. From deep cleaning carpets to removing fine particles on hard floors, the WindTunnel Tangle Guard upright vacuum is designed to have stronger, more direct suction at every pass. This powerful clean is easy to maneuver, carry around the home and up the stairs, thanks to its lightweight design and swivel steering. Reach beyond the floors with the built-in extension wand and specialty tools like the LED Crevice Tool, 2-in-1 Upholstery Tool & Dusting Brush, the Turbo Tool and a BONUS Filter – no surface will be left untouched. The filter captures and contains 99.95% of dust and dirt**. With an XL dirt cup, you can finish the job faster and with less trips to the trashcan.

Lightweight Easily clean all areas of the home with this portable and lightweight vacuum. High-Performance Filtration Keep your vacuum running like new with less maintenance. Easy Empty Dirt Cup Removable dirt cup makes post-cleanup quick and easy. Direct Suction Specifically designed to get strong, more direct suction with every pass.

LED Headlights Integrated LED headlights illuminate the cleaning path to easily see the dirt ahead. Prevents Hair Wrap Easily clean multiple surfaces without worrying about hair (up to 16 inches long) wrapping around the brush roll. Filtration System The filter captures and contains 99.95% of dust and dirt** Above Floor Cleaning Clean hard to reach areas easily with the built-in extension wand, and specialty tools for cleaning upholstery and stairs.

Hoover's here to make you feel right at home Comfort at home is our priority. Our products are designed to improve the well-being of your home because when your house feels good, it helps you to feel good too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars AMAZING SUCTION ACTION; heavy but works
reviews.reviewText: Bought just after Black Friday/Cyber Monday for 36% off, $90. First impression when I unboxed it and inserted the shaft and tightened the screw, was that each part looked squeaky clean (which is good as it means I didn’t receive a used vacuum) but at the same time made the vacuum look like a hunk of cheap plastic. I was wrong about the last part though, as after vacuuming a room’s rug (with the vacuum set at 2-low carpet), I certainly felt the plastic was strong and sturdy to handle the powerful suction enough to realize this was a good purchase. I attached photos of what collected in the bagless dust bin after just vacuuming a small room. TOTALLY BLOWN AWAY. No more buying those small vacuums where the head can twist and turn in 180degrees. Onto the bad part: when I inserted the bin and clicked it in place on the vacuum, I inspected the duct that connects the hose to the bin, and saw it does not line up perfectly. In fact, there is a tiny gap where small amounts of dust can escape, so hopefully that doesn’t become a problem in the future. As for now this experience taught me it works really well so I have hope.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Strong, next to perfect
reviews.reviewText: I didn't realize how weak my vacuum cleaner had become until I bought this one. It got everything out of the rugs, deeply too. I did all the rugs and two carpeted bedrooms and the container was nearly half filled. Superb vacuum cleaner. The self-winding chord can be fussy at times. I found that it rewinds best if you gently pump the lever with your foot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I Like It, It Works Well!
reviews.reviewText: A little heavy, but this is a heavy hitter. Nice vacuum works very well, I've had it a month or two. Cord retract is a little slow/lazy but just keep it pushed down it retracts slowly but surely so far (the future?). Caught it at a good price better than my last vacuum (lower price point) let's see if it lasts as long as my last hoover I bough in 2000/2001 and lasted 20 years (maybe longer given a shot) my girlfriend wanted a newer vacuum which only lasted a couple of years. I've had good experiences with hoover vacuums my entire life and hope this one continues the tradition for years to come as I sail closer and closer to senior citizenship. Ownership: 2 or 3 month at the time of this review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars OH BOY, this works just like my old one.
reviews.reviewText: i don't know what i ran over with the old one-which makes a noise, the but the new one is just like the old one, so i don't have to learn new things, seems different quality though and the screw i had to take out the old one to get the handle on, didn't quite screw in, without trying and trying, but i do like it very much. Feels lighter weight too. i wanted the same vac and this one is great....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars MOST AWESOME VACUUM CLEANER I'VE EVER OWNED
reviews.reviewText: I had a 12amp Wind Tunnel that I'd had for about two years that, despite the screws breaking off when I tried replacing the belt in AGAIN, I loved how well it worked.I bought this one, based upon the 12amp answer that someone gave about it. When it was delivered I discovered that it is actually a 10amp. I decided, though, to at least give it a try, before returning it.When I vacuumed my carpet (which my entire apartment is) it vacuumed up so much stuff I thought it was tearing up my carpet. As it turned out, it was actually vacuuming up what my previous vacuum cleaner had started leaving behind.Since I've owned this one, my carpet has never felt and looked so clean. It works as good my old steel vacuum cleaner (I paid hundreds for), and it isn't as bulky and heavy.It has more bristles than my last Hoover, and more suction power, so it gets everything in one pass. And it has no problem vacuuming up pet hair. I have Belgian Malinois who sheds constantly (despite regularly brushing), so I vacuum almost daily. It gets every bit of her hair easily.The hose is super flexible and easy to work with cleaning ceiling fans, vents, and blinds. No more having to dust those first. I can do them all all at once.It works amazingly well on regular floors, without kicking back and throwing stuff out the back end.All in all...it is the best and most awesome vacuum cleaner I've ever owned. The price is a huge bonus.I highly recommend it!!!On a side note...1) The canister really should be emptied after each vacuuming. I, personally, also always brush mine with a bottle brush to keep it from clogging, and so I don't have to wash it as often. The hose, canister, and filter should be washed regularly. Otherwise that's what causes that nasty vacuum cleaner smell...you don't want your home smelling like when you vacuum.I also fully extend the hose and replace it, before emptying the canister, to get out anything that might be caught between the grooves of the hose.2) To keep the Cord Rewind working properly, the cord shouldn't be pulled out much further past the yellow warning, and especially not past the red warnings that it has. And, the cord should be untwisted before, or as you're rewinding it, so it rewinds as it should.HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!
Me gusto bastante, es muy potente, tiene varias velocidades, los aditamentos funcionan bien lo unico es que es bastante pesada y hace mucho ruido pero supongo que es normal por la potencia que tiene
